overview:
A seasoned information systems management executive with over 15 years of increasing management experience with an exceptionally strong background in information technology platforms, (SaaS/IaaS) network management, service management and telecommunication technologies.

A driven team leader committed to maximizing company success, with a proven record of transforming start-up firms from concept to Acquisition or IPO. Previous examples of his work have created nearly $2B in shareholder equity with companies such as Adify (Aqusition by Cox Enterprises for $350m and Flycast Networks IPO and later acquisition in a deal valued at $1.4B)
